ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: I cannot say that it is for sure, but when I moved from being a dex/chr bard to a more focussed AC bard, I noticed significant amounts of missed notes than
ygData.messageBody:
I cannot say that it is for sure, but when I moved from being a dex/chr
bard to a more focussed AC bard, I noticed significant amounts of missed
notes than before. Mind you when I gained 25 AC, I lost about 20-30
points of Dex so the drop was pretty significant. Prior to the change I
was in the area of about 140 dex and now I have 107.

Trei

On Thu, 18 May 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:

> we've all heard this. has anyone tested it?
>
> Shada
>
> > 5) Decreases song missed note rate
